page.title: 08LOCAL TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content:
We decided to find out how much traffic used the roads in our area. For the Domesday Survey, we chose Monday 3rd June 1985 from 1.30pm to 2.30 pm. Our survey was to cover the main roads near the school i.e. Gamull Lane and Longridge Road. We split into four groups. Groups 1 and 2 surveyed Gamull Lane, groups 3 and 4 surveyed Longridge Road. Each traffic group had the job of counting cars, lorries, vans, motor bikes, cycles and buses.
Gp1 Gp2 Gp3 Gp4 cars 172 101 191 172 Lorries 34 7 35 34 Vans 46 11 37 46 Motor Bikes 7 2 4 7 Buses 13 1 11 13 Tractors 2 0 1 2 Bicycles 8 6 0 8
